categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text:
Operation: Shadowstrike was a mission put together by the Rebel Alliance to retrieve the Y-wing pilot Kala Kevv (codenamed Prodigal-One) and his datacard (codenamed Prodigal-Two) on the unexplored planet NCW-781.
The SpecForces had to complete their mission before the arrival of an Interdictor cruiser in the system.
